item.title: Traffic stop leads to discovery of fentanyl cache
item.description: Lab results received Sept. 18 confirmed the drugs tested positive for fentanyl.

item.title: Marion County sheriff massive search was caused by a hoax
item.description: Marion County sheriff massive search was caused by a hoax

item.title: Newsletter aims to connect dots behind headlines
Bending the Arc application period opens
Bending the Arc: Students experience history on spring beak
HCA Blake Hospital adds new treatment for hypertension patients
item.description: The procedure, approved in 2023, lowers blood pressure in patients with resistant hypertension.

item.title: George Hardy, decorated Tuskegee Airman, dies in Sarasota at 100
item.description: His decorations include two Distinguished Flying Crosses, the Legion of Merit, and the Air Medal with multiple oak leaf clusters.

item.title: Hillsborough County jail guard arrested in Manatee, charged with DUI
item.description: She was taken into custody and refused to provide a breath sample, deputies said.

item.title: Couple sentenced to prison for sexual activity with animals, state attorney says
item.description: John White was sentenced to 73.5 months in prison, followed by 84 months of probation.

item.title: Teen who claimed he was shot, kidnapped faked his disappearance, deputies say
item.description: Charges against the teen are being considered.

item.title: Woman’s death ruled a homicide, Bradenton Police say
item.description: A woman died of " significant and serious injuries," Bradenton Police said.

item.title: Florida drivers face new penalties for DUI arrests
item.description: Beginning Oct. 1, drivers will face increased penalties for refusing a breathalyzer or urine tests after DUI arrests.

item.title: Suncoast residents share memories of late Tuskegee Airman George Hardy
item.description: Getson Grimes, a Sarasota business owner and barber, said he was good friends with Tuskegee Hardy, meeting him and 16 other retired Tuskegee Airmen who moved to Sarasota nearly 30 years ago.

item.title: K-9 captures speeding suspect that other deputies couldn’t catch
item.description: According to jail records, Schumacher has a lengthy arrest record dating back to 2013.

item.title: The Suncoast is dry now but wetter to finish the week
item.description: Drier air moves in. Winds get breezy
